thread.title: Cameraman Gets Trampled During Scuffle Between UCLA and California Football Players
thread.title_full: Cameraman Gets Trampled During Scuffle Between UCLA and California Football Players | Complex UK

author: Brett Pollakoff
title: Cameraman Gets Trampled During Scuffle Between UCLA and California Football Players
text:
After UCLA beat Cal 40-24 on Thursday, there was some pushing and shoving as the teams got together for the customary postgame handshake.
And one cameraman got a little too close to the action.
This wasn't close to the biggest fight in football last night, and as we've seen elsewhere, the postgame handshake thing can at times be a recipe for disaster .
But just like the referee at the beginning of the video can be seen getting out of there as soon as things got heated, the cameraman should have known better, and tried to do the same.
